args.natural_language_statement: Prove that SO(n) = {A ∈ O(n) : det A = 1} is a matrix group. Translate to Lean4: define SO as the set of orthogonal matrices with determinant 1 (as units of the matrix ring) and state that it is a subgroup (IsSubgroup) of the group of units of matrices. End the Lean4 statement with := by sorry.

args.content:
import Mathlib
open Matrix

variable {n : Type*} [Fintype n] [DecidableEq n]

/-- The special orthogonal group SO(n) as the set of real n × n matrices A with A * Aᵀ = I and det A = 1. -/
def SO : Set (Matrix n n ℝ) := { A | A ⬝ A.transpose = 1 ∧ A.det = 1 }

/-- SO(n) is a matrix group. -/
theorem isMatrixGroup_SO : IsMatrixGroup (SO : Set (Matrix n n ℝ)) := by sorry

import Mathlib
open Matrix

variable {n : Type*} [Fintype n] [DecidableEq n]

/-- The special orthogonal group SO(n) as matrices in O(n) with determinant 1. -/
def SO_set : Set (Matrix n n ℝ) := { A | A ⬝ A.transpose = 1 ∧ A.det = 1 }

/-- The special orthogonal group as a subset of the units. -/
def SO_units : Set ((Matrix n n ℝ)ˣ) := { u | (u : Matrix n n ℝ) ⬝ (u : Matrix n n ℝ).transpose = 1 ∧ (u : Matrix n n ℝ).det = 1 }

/-- SO(n) is a subgroup of the group of units of matrices. -/
theorem isMatrixGroup_SO : IsSubgroup (SO_units : Set ((Matrix n n ℝ)ˣ)) := by sorry

import Mathlib
open Matrix

variable {n : Type*} [Fintype n] [DecidableEq n]

/-- The special orthogonal group as a subset of matrix units: u such that u * uᵀ = I and det u = 1. -/
def SO_units : Set ((Matrix n n ℝ)ˣ) :=
  { u | (u : Matrix n n ℝ) ⬝ Matrix.transpose (u : Matrix n n ℝ) = 1 ∧ Matrix.det (u : Matrix n n ℝ) = 1 }

/-- SO(n) is a subgroup of the group of units of n×n real matrices. -/
theorem isMatrixGroup_SO : IsSubgroup (SO_units : Set ((Matrix n n ℝ)ˣ)) := by
  sorry

import Mathlib
open Matrix

variable (n : ℕ)

/-- The special orthogonal group SO(n) as a subset of matrix units: u such that u * uᵀ = I and det u = 1. -/
def SO_units : Set ((Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ℝ)ˣ) :=
  { u | (u : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ℝ) ⬝ Matrix.transpose (u : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ℝ) = 1 
        ∧ Matrix.det (u : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ℝ) = 1 }

/-- SO(n) is a subgroup of the group of units of n×n real matrices. -/
theorem isMatrixGroup_SO : IsSubgroup (SO_units n : Set ((Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ℝ)ˣ)) := by
  sorry

import Mathlib
open Matrix

variable (n : ℕ)

/-- The special orthogonal group as a subset of matrix units: u such that u * uᵀ = I and det u = 1. -/
def SO_units : Set ((Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ℝ)ˣ) :=
  { u | (u : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ℝ) ⬝ (u : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ℝ).transpose = 1 
        ∧ Matrix.det (u : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ℝ) = 1 }

/-- SO(n) is a subgroup of the group of units of n×n real matrices. -/
theorem isMatrixGroup_SO : IsSubgroup (SO_units (n) : Set ((Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ℝ)ˣ)) := by
  sorry

import Mathlib
open Matrix

variable (n : ℕ)

/-- SO(n) as a subset of the units of n×n real matrices: u such that u * uᵀ = I and det u = 1. -/
def SO_units : Set ((Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ℝ)ˣ) :=
  { u | (u : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ℝ) ⬝ (u : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ℝ).transpose = 1
        ∧ Matrix.det (u : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ℝ) = 1 }

/-- SO(n) is a subgroup of the group of units of n×n real matrices. -/
theorem is_subgroup_SO : IsSubgroup (SO_units n : Set ((Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ℝ)ˣ)) := by sorry
